name: Day D Tower Rush & Medieval Defenders
name_original: Day D Tower Rush & Medieval Defenders
description:
Day D Tower Rush
Plunge into an era of dinosaurs and pre-historic creatures using a time machine.
Medieval Defenders
Defend your ancestral castle – show the invader who the master is! Build towers, save money, train your spells, and your enemy will be vanquished.


Day D Tower Rush & Medieval Defenders

Compatible with PlayStation®Vita only.
Gameplay requires PlayStation®Vita memory card (sold separately).
10500KB minimum space required
1 Player
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
